Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerPlayer, HumanPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for players. The HumanPlayer and ComputerPlayer classes extend player to have the base methods for what a player needs.
